name: Clean Kitty
description:
This poor little cat is in a rough shape. You are the new pet cleaner in town, and you have a lot to prove if you want to be the very best. Do you think you can tame this wild beat in under 20 second and leave it squeaky clean ?

HOW TO PLAY:

    To win this game you must use the proper tool for the each of the dirt pieces in the cat's body. You will find overgrown nails, untidy hairs, fur balls and leave debris. These must be dealt with the nail clippers, fur brush, scissors and a hose.

    Use your left mouse button while the correct tool is selected and the tempo is right to remove the dirt from this poor cat and score yourself some points!
